rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {02, 03}

description: This unit is designed to lay important foundations of traffic engineering knowledge.  It is designed to develop students' understanding of contemporary topics in traffic flow theory and their applications. The course is also designed to provide a rigorous and practical coverage of the collection of traffic data. The traffic surveys component of the course will cover traditional techniques for counting, classification and origin-destination surveys and we will also consider the capabilities of new traffic data collection equipment.
